_comment: Add a _ before an option name to comment it out and it wont be added to the apworld
Using 'goal' as the name of an option let you override some of the generated goal parameters
goal.description: How to End your Randomized playthrough. sp = Ship Part | spo = Ship Part Optional

filler_traps._comment: Using values here let you set a 'recommended' filler_trap percentage or even a default percentage
